body_html:
Completely agree. The current wording on the page is:

We hope that the TensorFlow community will develop front ends for other languages like JavaScript, Lua, R and perhaps others [...]

This reads to me as if the listed bindings are the only ones so far. I think it'd be great to list community supported bindings here as well as calling for more (with a disclaimer that they are not official).

body:
Completely agree. The current wording on the page is:

> We hope that the TensorFlow community will develop front ends for other languages like JavaScript, Lua, R and perhaps others [...]

This reads to me as if the listed bindings are the only ones so far. I think it'd be great to list community supported bindings here as well as calling for more (with a disclaimer that they are not official).
